price: 81. Miyuusan (Alle ee ah) Kan abuuray samooyinka iyo arlada awoodin inuu abuuro iyagoo kale17? Haaheey, Waana Abuuraha Sare, wax kasta Ogsoonaha ah.
arabic: أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخۡلُقَ مِثۡلَهُمۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلۡخَلَّٰقُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
footnotes: 17. Soo nooleeyo aadmiga oo dib u abuuro.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: awalaysa alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa biqādirin ʿalā an yakhluqa mith'lahum balā wahuwa al-khalāqu al-ʿalīmu
